issue.title: ODE collision space not deleted when model is removed from the world

content.raw: Yes, of course I should do that, where is my mind. The branch can be found here: https://bitbucket.org/ElteHupkes/gazebo/src/566c84a6bf3cdf96804cd411b92f9462a24110f0?at=gazebo6-revolve. I list the issues I (have attempted to) resolve in [this file](https://bitbucket.org/ElteHupkes/gazebo/src/566c84a6bf3cdf96804cd411b92f9462a24110f0/revolve-changes.md?at=gazebo6-revolve&fileviewer=file-view-default).
